description:
hi

this a demo

Expect more soon

I just didn't wanted to put this as a tester/"patreon" exclusive content sooo...

Controlls:

Arrow keys to move
Z to jump
X to suplex (dash)
Shift to move faster (Still no mach, sorry)
Escape to pause
R to restart the scene
